# [Interview #702, Entry #18](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=702#18)

#### Question

I just want you to say yes or no: does either Marsh or Sazed show up in the Alloy of Law?

#### Brandon Sanderson

Oh, you get a RAFO card! There you go...

#### Footnote

Yes.
